channel.title: Version 5.17 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 5.17.1 (2023-06-22) Enhancements [feature][change] highlight: make copy to clipboard appear on hover #574 5.17.0 (2023-06-22) Enhancements [feature] highlight: add configurable line breaks #169 Fixes [bug] theme: support Hugo 0.114.0 #573 [bug] taxonomy: fix number tags #570 [bug] highlight: improve copy to clipboard #569
